mapper.insert: insert into TBL_CHANNEL (CHANNEL_ID, CHANNEL_NAME, POS_CHANNEL, COMPANY_CODE, SEQUENCE_NUM, SAP_CHANNEL, DC_STORE_ID, STATUS) values (#{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequenceNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sapChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcStoreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update TBL_CHANNEL set CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POS_CHANNEL = #{posChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQUENCE_NUM = #{sequenceNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SAP_CHANNEL = #{sapChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DC_STORE_ID = #{dcStoreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CHANNEL_ID, CHANNEL_NAME, POS_CHANNEL, COMPANY_CODE, SEQUENCE_NUM, SAP_CHANNEL, DC_STORE_ID, STATUS from TBL_CHANNEL where CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CHANNEL_ID, CHANNEL_NAME, POS_CHANNEL, COMPANY_CODE, SEQUENCE_NUM, SAP_CHANNEL, DC_STORE_ID, STATUS from TBL_CHANNEL
